originalText.text: Great service here. I feel lost at CVS, and if you need to call them, it is hellish. It is the exact opposite here, and so refreshing to talk to an actual person.

text.text: Great service here. I feel lost at CVS, and if you need to call them, it is hellish. It is the exact opposite here, and so refreshing to talk to an actual person.

originalText.text: Levit pharmacy is such a good pharmacy. They had PCR and rapid tests. The staff was so nice to me. I was scared to get the test but they were very reassuring and professional. They risk their lives and their family lives so that the community can live safely.

text.text: Levit pharmacy is such a good pharmacy. They had PCR and rapid tests. The staff was so nice to me. I was scared to get the test but they were very reassuring and professional. They risk their lives and their family lives so that the community can live safely.

originalText.text: Always reliable, no mistakes, and they show concern for their customers. Great people, great work. Adam, Jasmine, and, John have treated me well and like ACTUAL family. I live in the Bronx and I still come all the way to the L.E.S. because of loyalty. I started going to them when I still lived in Brooklyn and it was a 20 minute train ride. My meds come up to a nice penny every month and I'll ALWAYS keep my business with them. They have earned the loyalty over about 7-8 years.

originalText.text: Love Levitt Pharmacy. Reliable and fast. Got my PRC test within 72 hours and the staff is personable and professional. Highly recommend. Five stars

text.text: Love Levitt Pharmacy. Reliable and fast. Got my PRC test within 72 hours and the staff is personable and professional. Highly recommend. Five stars

originalText.text: I've been dealing with Levitt's pharmacy for about 10yrs now and can honestly say that i never had a bad experience.  They truly care about there customers and take out their time to help everyone. I appreciate the staff and I'm truly grateful for them. :)
